description: Deletes an Amazon Web Services Migration Hub Refactor Spaces application. Before you can delete an application, you must first delete any services or routes within the application.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the application's environment.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the environment was last updated.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the application.
